column4: hey, can anyone help me? I can no longer view software in "software center" - ubuntu lucid 10.04: I'd like to know how to reintroduce the packages to software center.
ok ill do that now thanks
this is the message i got back: Type 'â€œdeb' is not known on line 52 in source list /etc/apt/sources.list
you need open sources.list and edit the line it said, change the ", I think
did you edit the file as i said?
press down key until you get to line 52, I guess it's some where in the end
yes, delete the " char , all of them
and ctrl + x to exit, then run sudo apt-get update again
when you press ctral + o, look at the bottom, it will ask you the name, just hit enter there
did you press Ctrl + x to exit nano?
you should do that, and run sudo apt-get update before check in Ubuntu Software Center
